Class HandleShotLv2

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.controller.State.AdventureState
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.controller.State.CombatZoneStates.Lv2.HandleShotLv2
public class HandleShotLv2 extends AdventureState
Represents the state at Combat Zone Level 2 where a single shot is applied to a player's ship.

This state handles the logic for processing a specific Shot, determining whether it is blocked or mitigated using batteries, and applying damage to the ship's components.

Once the current shot is processed, the state transitions to the next Penalty3Lv2 state with updated iteration.

      Parameters:
      advContext - The current adventure phase context.
      player - The player whose ship is being hit.
      coordinate - The coordinate where the shot is targeted.
      iterationsHit - The current index of the shot being handled.

  • Method Details

    • handleShot

      public Player handleShot(String username, Map<Battery,Integer> batteries)
      Applies the current shot to the specified player's ship.

      The method checks the type of shot (small or large), whether the shot direction is protected, and if the player is attempting to use batteries. Depending on the player's choice and protection status, either the ship component is destroyed or batteries are consumed.

      After handling the shot, the method transitions to Penalty3Lv2 to continue processing remaining shots (if any).

      Overrides:
      handleShot in class AdventureState
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the player expected to take the hit.
      batteries - A map of batteries and how many charges the player intends to use.
      Returns:
      The player object after applying damage or battery usage.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the username does not match or if batteries are null.
